taxi.model.Route

  • Packages that use Route 
    Package Description
    taxi.model  
    taxi.resource

    • Uses of Route in taxi.model

      Methods in taxi.model that return Route 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Route Request.getRoute()
      getRoute method
      Methods in taxi.model with parameters of type Route 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Request.setRoute(Route route)
      setRoute method this method sets the given Route to the attribute route of the caller object.
      void Request.startRequest(Route route)
      startRequest method sets the route to the already made request

    • Uses of Route in taxi.resource

      Methods in taxi.resource that return Route 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Route EvaluationInfo.getRoute(javax.persistence.EntityManager em)
      getRoute method This method is used for getting a Route object from a RouteInfo object

    • Uses of Route in taxi.service

      Methods in taxi.service that return Route 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Route RequestHandlingService.createRoute(Request req, java.lang.String fromAddress, java.lang.String toAddress, java.lang.String fromCity, java.lang.String toCity, int fromZipCode, int toZipCode)
      createRoute method This method gets as parameters: the request object made by the customer, the origin address, the origin city, the origin zip code, the destination address, the destination city and the destination zip code This method creates a route with information given by the customer.
      Methods in taxi.service with parameters of type Route 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Evaluation EvaluationService.createEvaluation(Route route, int rating, java.lang.String comment)
      Evaluation method createEvaluation gets as inputs the route, which customer evaluates, the rating and comment.
